webviewColor.name: Background color
webviewColor.hint: Changes the color of the webview background
webviewColor.label: Choose Color

notifications.settingsError: Something is wrong with the webview settings. Check your formatting.

html.compatDisclaimer: Compatibility mode logs domain names to prevent proxy abuse.
html.extensionDisclaimer: If compatibility mode doesn't work, try the extension
html.loginDisclaimer: Logging in won't work sometimes, first try logging in while devtools (F12) is open, otherwise create an issue on the extension github

confirmExit.name: Confirm Exit
confirmExit.hint: Show a confirmation prompt if you close a viewer window.
confirmExit.title: Are you sure?
confirmExit.content: Are you sure you want to close this view?

confirmExport.title: Are you sure?
confirmExport.content: Do you want to export this webview with it's current settings to a journal?

help.title: Help
help.addingDesc: You can add new webviewer entries in the bottom container, when you're done you can click the + button to add it to the list.
help.reorderingDesc: The order of the entries corrosponds with the order they'll show up in the button list, you can change the order with the ᐱ and ᐯ buttons.

datafields.title: Data Fields
datafields.name: Name (Required)
datafields.nameDesc: The name field sets what name will show up in the header of the webviewer window and the button name.
datafields.urlDesc: The url field sets which url the webviewer loads.
datafields.iconDescA: The icon field is for the icon of the button, you can put any free
datafields.dimensionsDesc: The width and height fields set the width and the height of the webviewer window when it appears.
datafields.compatDesc: The compat checkbox activates compatibility mode, in this mode the webviewer uses a proxy. This can be used when the site does not function well normally.
datafields.compatWarn: Do keep in mind that the proxy logs the urls visited to prevent abuse!
datafields.removedDescA: This textbox only appears if compat mode is on. Any css selector (eg
datafields.removedDescB: you put in here will be hidden in the webviewer. This is because some things won't dissapear when compatibility mode is on because cookies don't work well with it.
datafields.propertiesDesc: These properties are HTML tags that will be added to the iframe element, eg:

settings.title: Webviewer Settings
settings.duplicate: Please do not use the same name twice.

extension.newVersion: There is a new extension version available
